Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/Cermak
ShortDescription: #94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Marshall Boulevard, Cermak, then resume their normal route on California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Marshall Boulevard, Cermak, then resume their normal route on California.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near California/Cermak.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier obstruction on the tracks near Belmont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier obstruction on the tracks near Belmont.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses are still available to provide connecting service between Jefferson Park and Racine in both directions until 5:15pm

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
